title: Triangological Learning Design for Academic English Collaboration

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate English reading/writing proficiency and comprehension of basic scientific terminology
context.additional_context: Implements an online collaborative learning environment combining academic writing and critical reading for science sector managers/leaders.

learning_goals: Learners extract core arguments from scientific academic texts with 80% accuracy through collaborative analysis with peers
Learners apply APA-formatted references with 95% accuracy when co-authoring documents on wiki platforms
Learners achieve over 70% completeness in systematically integrating complex concepts in academic writing tasks six months later
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
